description:
My place is close to Mr. Biggs, Mickey Spillane's. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the coziness, and the high ceilings. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and big groups.

This beautiful convenient apartment is just steps away from Times Square, Museums, Restaurants, and many other attractions.  The perfect space to get away for you, your friends, or your family!

All amenities in the apartment :)

This beautiful convenient apartment is just steps away from Times Square, Museums, Restaurants, and many other attractions.  The perfect space to get away for you, your friends, or your family!

Close to Time Square Subway Stations, Penn Station and Port Authority.

The apartment is located above a bar.
name: Comfy 1 Bedroom Apartment - Next to Time Square!
review: Todo muy bueno y buena ubicacion. Un unico problema, esta arriba de un bar
